<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Resource Timeline</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/resource/timeline"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::


 Returns a timeline of events and alerts for the given resource.
:::info
 **Replacement Â Endpoint: [Get Asset](/prisma-cloud/api/cspm/get-asset-details-by-id)**
:::



Only the **rrn** parameter in the request body is used for this API. Ignore the **timelineItemId** and 
**findingType** fields for this API.

An example request body is:
```json
{
  ""rrn": "rrn::instance:us-east-1:i-xxxxxxxxxx"
}
```
